mapper.insert: INSERT INTO academy_noticeboard (noticenum, memberid, noticetitle, noticecontent, noticehit) VALUES (academy_noticeboard_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT t1.noticenum, t1.memberid, t1.noticetitle, t1.noticecontent, t1.noticedate, t1.noticehit, t2.membername FROM academy_noticeboard t1, academy_member t2 WHERE t1.memberid = t2.memberid ORDER by t1.noticenum DESC

SELECT t1.noticenum, t1.memberid, t1.noticetitle, t1.noticecontent, t1.noticedate, t1.noticehit, t2.membername FROM academy_noticeboard t1, academy_member t2 WHERE t1.memberid = t2.memberid AND t1.noticetitle LIKE '%' || #{param1 } || '%' ORDER by t1.noticenum DESC
